transcript:
Customer: Malay ko call karne ke liye dhanyavad.
Malay aapke call ka jawab jald hi denge. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Kripya line par bane rahe.
Hello.
Hello.
Hello.
Executive: Ji Midland Agro Industries mein baat ho rahi hai meri?
Customer: Haan ji, Midland Agro mein baat ho rahi hai.
Executive: Namaskar sir, Shashank Tripathi baat kar raha hun. Senior Manager IndiaMART se aapke liye.
Customer: Ji, theek hai.
Executive: Sir actually aapne I think feedback mark kiya tha not satisfied ka na? To uske regarding maine call kiya hua tha. To koi issue aa raha hai sir kahin pe koi pareshani kuch help chahiye to bataye.
Customer: Actually bahut hi simple requirement maine aapke executive ko samjhai thi.
Actually kya hai, aur ye bare mein isse pehle bhi isse pehle ke bhi jo executive hai un logon se bhi baat ho chuki hai.
Haan, hamara jo business hai wo business seasonal business hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Abhi isme isme hota kya hai ki season pe hum by leads consume nahi karte.
Jo jab season nahi rehta hai jabki jo time hai hamara December, January, February, March usme hum lead consume karte hain aur baki ke mahino mein hame to business milta hi hai usme to hum time pe bhi delivery nahi de pa rahe.
Kyunki wo seasonal business jisko hum bolte hain.
To tab hum by lead consume nahi karte hain. To jab maine ye package liya tha bahut time pehle teen saal pehle ki baat hai jab aapka executive idhar aaya tha.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Unko unse bhi yahi charcha hui thi ki bhaiya hum season pe by lead nahi consume kar payenge.
To aap mujhe jo bhi by leads hai wo wo hisab se dijiyega ki main off season pe ye consume kar paun aur baki ka jo hai wo na consume kar paun.
Baki jo hisab se business chalega wo hisab se hum by lead consume karenge.
Aur dusra ek request kiya tha aap un logon ko ki wo kya bari bari bahut phone aate hain waha se.
Maine bola tha unko ki bhaiya main samne se jab bhi mujhe issue hoga main samne se call karunga aap call mat kijiye kyunki hame already hame season pe itna pressure rehta hai kaam karne ka.
Kyunki hamara utna bada business nahi hota hai seasonable ke hisab se.
To bari bari ek hi cheez samjha raha hun par un logon ko nahi samajh mein aa rahi hai. Wo ek hi baat bata rahe hain ye hamara kaam hai hame phone karna hai ye hai wo hai. Maine bola theek hai kaam karna hai but customer ko bhi dekhna hota hai na customer busy rehta hai kaam karta hai kyunki har ek har koi business bada nahi hota hai.
Abhi hum bhale business bhale business karte hain par hum bhi machine pe kaam karte hain.
Executive: Sahi hai.
Customer: Sahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai to wo hisab se maine.
Executive: Main aapke account manager ko bol deta hun wo aapko utna call nahi karenge kuch bhi agar rahega to aapko whatsapp kar denge wo.
Customer: Kyunki wo hamare do number hai main aur mera bhai ka hum dono bhi machine pe baith machine chalate hain dispatch karne jaate hain wo hisab se karte rehte hain thoda busy rehte hain schedule busy rehta hai hamara.
To unko bola hai par abhi unpe phone kaat rahi hai to mujhe phone kar rahi hai aur bol rahi hai mera kaam hai mera kaam hai theek hai aapka kaam hai par aap thoda customer ko to samjho kya issue aa raha hai.
Bole ki maine bahut baar bola hai ki thoda disturb kam kijiye jab bhi mujhe requirement hoga main samne se call karunga ki mujhe ye requirement hai.
Executive: Wo wo bar bar call nahi karenge aapko na.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Number aapka whatsapp karenge.
Customer: Haan ye number pe mera whatsapp hai aur dusra ek maine ye requirement bola tha ki agar aapka koi executive idhar aa paye to main usko samjha paun mere business ka structure kya hai. Apne hisab se sab google mein reviews de rahe hain ki ye nahi hai baat nahi kar pa rahe.
To main usko samjhana chahta hun ki ye hamara business ka strategy hai. Hamara ye business hai. Isse pehle koi Rahul karke ek banda tha.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Jab idhar maine package liya tha to aaya tha mujhe bahut samjha ke gaya tha tab uske baad maine package start kiya tha.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: To fir maine koi aur manager se bhi baat hua tha maine unko ek simple request bola hai ki koi executive idhar aa paye to main mere business ka nature usko samjha paun.
Ki kya issue aa raha hai IndiaMART se mujhe aur main agar.
Executive: Physical physical meeting to actually sir matlab chances thode se kam hai because aapke area mein office hona matlab mandatory hoga agar us location mein koi hamara channel partner rahega to try kar sakte hain to wo uske liye main ek bar pata laga leta hun koi baat nahi aap uska tension mat lijiye main actually aapko whatsapp pe add kar leta hun theek hai to aapka further koi bhi communication rahega uske liye aap whatsapp hi coordinate kar lenge aapko bar bar call karne ki requirement nahi padegi.
Customer: Bahut hi badhiya, bahut hi badhiya.
Executive: Theek hai ji baki agar kuch bhi rehta hai to aap mere ko whatsapp hi dalna.
Customer: Maine wahi executive ko wahi bola jo bhi agar main phone nahi utha raha hun aap kabhi bhi mujhe whatsapp kar sakte hain.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir abhi kaam unka bhi job hai sir karna to unko bhi padta hi hai abhi nahi theek hai main mana nahi kar raha hun par wo.
Wo piche pad jate hain kaat rahe hain phone message dal rahe hain ki we cannot.
Executive: Theek hai ji aap uske liye pareshani na le wo main unko samjha dunga.
Customer: Theek theek hai ji thank you so much sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to consume buyleads in off-season.

- Receiving too many calls from IndiaMART.

- Wants an executive to understand business structure.



Resolution:

- Executive will add customer on WhatsApp.

- Executive will inform account manager to reduce calls.

- Executive will check for channel partner for physical meeting.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, spam calls, physical meeting

seller_categories.mcat_name: Tractor Drawn Seed Cum Fertilizer Drill
